ygData.subject: RE: Mould Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Bracer of Battle, from CB warlord, the rarest spawn in CB.  Took me one whole day also cant get one with BoB on it.  This item, though not the most powerful
ygData.messageBody:
Bracer of Battle, from CB warlord, the rarest spawn in CB. Took me one
whole day also cant get one with BoB on it. This item, though not the most
powerful articfact found in CB (as compared to dirk, SBS, dwarven tunic
etc), is the most expensive one due to its rarest spawn - market price
100pp.

On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 5:26 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> JBoots is no trade. u need to loot urself to get it. what's BoB?? The
items
> u talking about should be the Bloodforge hammer I think
>

>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Wah, such a BIG offer. Pls loot a JBoot for ya humble friend Ziltus
will

> >

3
> > hrs. A dirk 5 hrs. A BoB 8 hrs.
> >
> > KNN I spend 3 days doing the SM quest.
> >
> > Now I got a blade mould and a sledge mould from the smith (another q
uest

with
> > it?

> > > > > When one of them hit 51, the rest of them will not increase
anymore?
> > > > i believe ziltus ask this question b4... but since i have one of
them
> > > > in the 40s, i should know bout it and start working on something,
> > > > otherwise the rest will not increase anymore... so ziltus dont tell
> > > > me u just spend one bloody day do nothing but just keep casting
> > > > spells?
> > > >
> > > > When one specialisation hits 51, the rest will not increase
> > > > BEYOND 50. They will still increase if below 50, but will cap out
at
> > > > 50.
> > > >
> > > > The one that hits 51 first will go on to your level cap.
> > > >
